package.name: kuka_cybertech_kr16_r1610_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the KUKA cybertech KR16 R1610.
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for KUKA cybertech KR 16 R1610 manipulators.
Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online datasheet here. All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.
NB: this package currently uses non-valid inertia parameters.

package.author: Simon Schmei√üer
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
